title: Axial and gauge anomalies in the field antifield quantization of the generalized Schwinger model
abstract: In the generalized Schwinger model the vector and axial vector currents are linearly coupled, with arbitrary coefficients, to the gauge connection. Therefore it represents an interesting example of a theory where both gauge anomalies and anomalous diver gences of global currents show up in general. We derive results for these two kinds of quantum corrections inside the field antifield framework.
